extendedInfo.description: Use your phone as a webcam on your computer over WiFi or USB*note* if you are having problems with Skype v6.2 please re-download and re-install client to fix the problem *Allows you to chat using "DroidCam Webcam" on your computer (Skype/Yahoo/MSN/etc..), and talk via "DroidCam Microphone*".You must download and install a computer client to use the app (Windows & Linux versions available). Visit www.dev47apps.com on your computer to install the client, and for usage info.Pro version, DroidCamX available: Various video formats and higher resolutions with less network usage, access via your browser (surveillance/ip camera), connect via 3G, bluetooth, camera flash, auto focus, zoom and more. Available for Android 2.1+. * Audio support is experimental:- Available on Windows XP - 7 only as an optional install- 64-bit Windows will block the audio driver by default- Not available via Bluetooth- On Android 2.3 (Gingerbread) audio recording is delayed by at least 1 second and delivered in larger chunks, thus not allowing DroidCam to stream and play-back smoothly. This seems to be fixed as of Android 4.0. KWD: Video Audio Camera Microphone Streaming USB Webcam

reviews.title: GREAT APP!
reviews.comment: Love this... A must use for those who want to vc, but don\'t have a web cam
reviews.author: Kushagra Shukla

reviews.title: audio lags @ lot!!!
reviews.comment: audio lags over skype.. sounds repeats.. if i said hello..then on other side they get hello hello hello hello... twice-thrice.. :( fix it..

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: Its a good cam... Just the frame rate is slow.

reviews.title: how to increase fps
reviews.comment: the video is very slow and goes after 10 seconds delay.tell me how to fix it.?
reviews.author: Ishu Gupta

reviews.title: It is not working as described
reviews.comment: I needed distant snapshots from my old LGVortex 5MP camera to provide my 7 years old animator-daughter with screenshots for her avi animations. Tried droidcam but it didn\'t work good. It doesn\'t give resolution of 5MP camera. 2MP Chinese webcam camera gives better picture and you  can do nothing using droidCam to improve picture. There is option of auto focus but it doesn\'t work. There is option of zoom but it doesn\'t work too. The screen size is flexible without ability to set any dimension and make serial screenshots. There is no option to record vgideo or make picture of the droidcam window.
reviews.author: Alexander Kachowski

reviews.title: Umm Sits starting server
reviews.comment: well the app just sits there saying starting server.... I eventually found out that means it has started up by trying to connect to it, and it worked, all be it with a bit of lag. then I tried chanding the screen resolution and starting and stopping the client and I ended up with pink and green stripes, even after I changed the rez back again, zooming in and out didn\'t seem to work either.  Linux software package installed fine though, and it worked nicely over reverse tunneling too.... (only once though!)P
reviews.author: Oliver Stieber

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work on Samsung Galaxy Note
reviews.comment: Tried very hard but not detecting   Useless
reviews.author: Nitish Gondkar

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: This is a great app! Installed easy. User Friendly. Clear Image (Make sure sufficient lighting is present in room in use; and good cell camera). TIPS: You must download the DroidCam app to your android, AND download the Client app for PC to your computer. Once you connect to Wi-Fi on cell, Client will (then) be able to \"connect\" to phone camera and pickup video feed. I was trying to connect without launching the app on the cell first---- you must launch app on cell, then connect via client on pc. The box with three dots allows you to test camera, or just use the feed from there depending on how you\'re using the app.
reviews.author: Quincy Baker

reviews.title: Most awaited!!
reviews.comment: It saved me around 100$ as i ws gonna buy an hd webcam... Bt this app served ma purpose!!.. A smart layout is recommended as it looks a bit poor!
reviews.author: Anubhav Sanganeria

reviews.title: Excellent....but..
reviews.comment: Skype problem solved but now it  doesnt work simultaneously with Wo Mic which is a microphone app. Now when this app connects, it closes the connection of Wo Mic!! Note: Both worked together before. this app\'s microphone feature is just a waste coz it echos repeatedly so i need Wo Mic too to work with it. So plz fix this issue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need Bigger Camera Output
reviews.comment: The camera output display needs to be able to be \"full screen\".  I\'d like to use this as an alternative to a document camera while teaching, but it the \"output display\" option has such a tiny tiny window. That\'s fine for just testing your connection, but the window itself could be used for other option. If this option could be improved (so the output display can be full screen) then that would be a huge help and useful improvement.
reviews.author: Karl Kosko
